bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Guide for Wind Loading Evaluation of High Voltage (&#x003E;1000 V) Air Break Switches
IEEE Draft Guide for Wind Loading Evaluation of High Voltage (&#x003E;1000 V) Air Break Switches

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This guide provides evaluation methods and application considerations for high voltage (&#x003E;1000 V) switches, as covered in IEEE Std C37.30.1, under wind loading conditions. This includes testing methods to meet both usual and unusual wind conditions

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
